welcomeHeading: Welcome to Qingdao Lolin Mech Inc.
heading: Our Customers

clients.name: Berco
clients.description: Berco is an Italian company specializing in manufacturing undercarriage components and rubber tracks.
clients.sampleNote: Qingdao Lolin supplied ADI sprockets and track rollers to Berco.

clients.name: Kito
clients.description: Kito is a Japanese company that manufactures and sells various types of machinery, primarily for materials handling and lifting equipment.
clients.sampleNote: Qingdao Lolin supplied parts of lifting hoists to Kito. Until now, we have developed more than 60 different kinds of casting and forming parts for Kito in Japan.

clients.name: Kverneland
clients.description: Kverneland Group is an international company developing, producing and distributing agricultural implements, electronics and digital services to the farming community.
clients.sampleNote: Qingdao Lolin supplied casting and forgings for tiller and ploughing machine to Kverneland.

clients.name: Lemken
clients.description: Lemken focuses on developing innovative solutions for productive and efficient agriculture.
clients.sampleNote: Qingdao Lolin supplied casting and forgings for agricultural machinery to Lemken.

clients.name: Nord
clients.description: Nord Drivesystems is a system provider of innovative drive solutions with competence in more than 100 industries.
clients.sampleNote: Qingdao Lolin supplied housing and covers for transmission/ gear box to Nord.

clients.name: Saint-Gobain
clients.description: Saint-Gobain is originally a mirror manufacturer, it also produces a variety of construction, high-performance, moderate-performance, lower-performance and other materials
clients.sampleNote: Qingdao Lolin supplied machined forgings for door-window opening system to Saint-Gobain.

clients.name: Selzer
clients.description: SELZER is a precision engineering company specializing in the development and production of complex metal components and assemblies for the automotive and mechanical industries.
clients.sampleNote: Qingdao Lolin supplied castings for engine system to Selzer.

clients.name: Thyssenkrupp
clients.description: Thyssenkrupp is one of the largest steel producers in the world and its products range from machines and industrial services to high-speed trains, elevators, and shipbuilding.
clients.sampleNote: Qingdao Lolin supplied forgings for construction machinery to Thyssenkrupp.

clients.name: Weber-Hydraulik
clients.description: Weber-Hydraulik primarily manufactures hydraulic components and systems for mobile work machines, commercial vehicles and machine tools.
clients.sampleNote: Qingdao lolin supplied castings with material of GJS 400 and green sand casting as well as forgings for the hydraulic cylinder system to Weber-Hydraulik.

clients.name: Westfalia Automotive
clients.description: Westfalia Automotive, as the inventor of the ball-head trailer coupling, is now one of the world's leading manufacturers of towing devices for cars and light commercial vehicles.
clients.sampleNote: Qingdao Lolin supplied castings and forgings for towing system of passenger cars to Westfalia Automotive.

clients.name: Yanmar
clients.description: Yanmar is a japanese diesel engine, heavy machinery and agricultural machinery manufacturer
clients.sampleNote: Qingdao Lolin supplied castings and forgings for excavators to Yanmar.

clients.name: CAT
clients.description: Caterpillar Inc., also known as CAT, is an American construction, mining and other engineering equipment manufacturer.
clients.sampleNote: Qingdao lolin supplied wheel loader foot pedals (with materials of GJS 450 and green sand casting process) for excavators and wheelloaders to Caterpillar.

clients.name: Komatsu
clients.description: Komatsu is a Japanese multinational corporation that manufactures construction, mining, forestry and military heavy equipment, as well as diesel engines and industrial equipment like press machines, lasers and thermoelectric generators.
clients.sampleNote: Qingdao Lolin supplied castings for excavators to Komatsu.

clients.name: Kubota
clients.description: Kubota produces many products including tractors and other agricultural machinery, construction equipment, engines, vending machines, pipe, valves, cast metal, pumps, and equipment for water purification, sewage treatment and air conditioning.
clients.sampleNote: Qingdao lolin supplied excavator bracket link parts (also known as swing post) to Kubota, with material of GJS 500-7.

clients.name: Tadano
clients.description: Tadano is the main and largest Japan-based manufacturer of cranes and aerial work platforms, considered one of largest crane manufacturers in the world.
clients.sampleNote: Qingdao Lolin supplied castings and forgins for mobile cranes to Tadano.

cookieMessage:

No personal data is collected, stored, or shared. By continuing to use the site, you acknowledge this.
